meanings.sent1: The putrescent fruit attracted flies with its foul smell.
meanings.sent2: The garbage left in the hot sun became putrescent and started to decay.
meanings.sent3: The putrescent smell from the trash can made everyone hold their noses.
meanings.sent4: The putrescent stench of the decaying meat filled the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The putrescent liquid oozed out of the rotten pumpkin, creating a disgusting sight.

meanings.definition: Emitting a foul odor due to decay.
meanings.sent1: The putrescent cheese left in the fridge for too long smelled terrible.
meanings.sent2: The putrescent smell coming from the old fish market was unbearable.
meanings.sent3: The putrescent aroma of the spoiled milk made everyone gag.
meanings.sent4: The putrescent odor of the decaying leaves filled the autumn air.
meanings.sent5: The putrescent stink of the rotting garbage lingered in the alleyway.
